snippet: If your iPad doesn’t have enough room to store a lot of movies, you can wirelessly stream the video files from the iTunes library instead with Apple’s Home Sharing feature.
abstract: If your iPad doesn’t have enough room to store a lot of movies, you can wirelessly stream the video files from the iTunes library instead with Apple’s Home Sharing feature.

headline.main: Q&A: Streaming Videos From PC to Tablet
headline.print_headline:
Streaming Videos 
From PC to Tablet
